Class TestPlayerBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestPlayerBackend

  • public class TestPlayerBackend
extends Object
    This class tests all of the methods of PlayerBackend. Since it is the one communicating to the backendDatabase, any type of string you can input into the backendDatabase will be checked

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testChangeLevelDetails()
      This method tests whether the changeProfileDetails method successfully changes the level achieved of a player
      void testChangeProfileDetails()
      This method tests whether the changeProfileDetails method successfully changes the requisite fields
      void testCheckLogin()
      This method tests whether the login checking mechanism is in order
      void testCheckSecurityQuestion()
      This method tests whether only the correct Answer to the Security Question is accepted
      void testCreatePlayer()
      This method tests the creation of a player in the backend backendDatabase
      void testFindPlayer()
      This method tests whether the findPlayer method suceeds in finding a player that has been added
      void testRemovePlayer()
      This method tests whether the player is removed successfully from the backendDatabase by the removePlayer method
